LawFirm.title: LawFirm
LawFirm.description: Represents the law firm and its core information.

id.description: Unique identifier for the law firm entity.

name.description: The name of the law firm.

address.description: The physical address of the law firm.

email.description: The email address of the law firm.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the law firm.

LegalService.title: LegalService
LegalService.description: Represents a specific legal service offered by the firm.

id.description: Unique identifier for the legal service.

title.description: The title of the legal service (e.g., 'Compliance').

description.description: A detailed description of the legal service.

icon.description: Icon associated with the service, could be a URL or icon name.

AttorneyProfile.title: AttorneyProfile
AttorneyProfile.description: Represents the profile of an attorney at the law firm.

id.description: Unique identifier for the attorney profile.

name.description: The full name of the attorney.

bio.description: A biography or description of the attorney.

email.description: The email address of the attorney.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the attorney.

imageUrl.description: URL to the attorney's profile image.

Testimonial.title: Testimonial
Testimonial.description: Represents a testimonial from a client.

clientName.description: The name of the client providing the testimonial.

companyName.description: The company name of the client.

logoUrl.description: URL to the client's company logo.

ContactFormSubmission.title: ContactFormSubmission
ContactFormSubmission.description: Represents a submission from the contact form.

id.description: Unique identifier for the contact form submission.

name.description: The name of the person submitting the form.

email.description: The email address of the person submitting the form.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the person submitting the form.

message.description: The message from the contact form.

submissionDate.description: The date and time the form was submitted.

FAQ.title: FAQ
FAQ.description: Represents a frequently asked question and its answer.

order.description: The display order of the FAQ.

Each top-level collection is associated with a `lawFirmId` enabling easy querying and data isolation between law firms. All data associated with a law firm is stored under collections with the `lawFirmId` such as `/lawFirms/{lawFirmId}/legalServices/{legalServiceId}`. The use of explicit state modeling is not directly applicable in this scenario as there is no explicit state needed.
